name: Callable - Get Platform Org and Customer Details
description:
**Trigger** : It's a callable recipe which will get to get the customer details and platform organisation id.

**Description**: Using Sales order internal id pull the customer details and organisations data querying though multiple objects and pass into the mapping object.

**Actions**:  Sales order internal id comes from payload which helps to get the SF orders data and orders contains opp id which can help to fetch fulfilment configurations details and inside that you can pull Platform customer and Platform organisation details .
Once you have customer details and org id we can map these values into mapping object and pass it into the AWS lambda.
